segments.text: What a disgusting mess that overflowing sink is making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water splashing everywhere, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddleâ€”gross, she'll slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's clueless, fussing over that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those bratty kids stealing cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's gonna topple that stool and make it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just begging for her handout, no shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, but in here it's filthy chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widening, probably ruining the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this irresponsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before it's a total disaster!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies crumbling everywhere if they drop them.
segments.speaker: PAR
